data.comment: The match has started.
Fulham have been awarded a corner by Graham Scott.
In the minute 2, Ademola Lookman (Fulham) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Free kick for Fulham in the half of Crystal Palace.
Can Fulham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crystal Palace's half?
In the minute 6, Crystal Palace have a goal kick.
Important block from the Crystal Palace defence as Aleksandar Mitrovic fires in a strike for Fulham.
Wilfried Zaha for Crystal Palace drives towards goal at Craven Cottage. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Goal! Jairo Riedewald gives Crystal Palace a 0-1 lead in London.
In the minute 8, That's a fine assist from Wilfried Zaha.
Michy Batshuayi (Crystal Palace) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 11, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Graham Scott awards the home team a throw-in.
Graham Scott signals a free kick to Fulham in their own half.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Crystal Palace at Craven Cottage.
Throw-in for Fulham close to the penalty box.
In London, Aleksandar Mitrovic of Fulham is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 14, In London a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Fulham pushes forward through Ademola Lookman, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Fulham.
In the minute 16, Fulham have been awarded a corner by Graham Scott.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Fulham close to the penalty box.
Fulham's Ademola Lookman misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 17, It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
Ball goes out of play for a Fulham goal kick.
Throw-in Crystal Palace.
In the minute 20, Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
Graham Scott signals a Crystal Palace throw-in in Fulham's half.
Ball safe as Fulham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 21, Free kick for Crystal Palace in their own half.
Wilfried Zaha (Crystal Palace) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Graham Scott awards Fulham a goal kick.
In the minute 23, Throw-in high up the field for Fulham in London.
Goal kick for Fulham at Craven Cottage.
Fulham are on the attack at Craven Cottage, where Ademola Lookman is presented with a great scoring opportunity. But the ball hits the upright!
In the minute 26, Aleksandar Mitrovic for Fulham gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Graham Scott awards Crystal Palace a goal kick.
Throw-in for Fulham in the half of Crystal Palace.
In the minute 28, Crystal Palace awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Crystal Palace's Michy Batshuayi is whistled for offside at Craven Cottage.
Can Fulham capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Crystal Palace's half?
In the minute 31, Crystal Palace awarded a free kick in their own half.
Michy Batshuayi gets his shot on target but fails to score for Crystal Palace.
Crystal Palace to take a throw-in in Fulham territory.
In the minute 33, Can Fulham capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Fulham's Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Crystal Palace goal kick.
In the minute 35, Throw-in for Crystal Palace in their own half.
Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace in their own half.
In the minute 38, Free kick for Crystal Palace in their own half.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace at Craven Cottage.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Crystal Palace in the half of Fulham.
Can Fulham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crystal Palace's half?
Graham Scott signals a free kick to Fulham in their own half.
In the minute 44, Crystal Palace awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Craven Cottage the fourth official shows that 2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick Crystal Palace.
In the minute 45, Crystal Palace's Luka Milivojevic breaks free at Craven Cottage. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Fulham at Craven Cottage.
The first half has been concluded at Craven Cottage.
In the minute 46, Graham Scott has blown to start the second-half.
Ball safe as Fulham is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Graham Scott signals a free kick to Fulham.
In the minute 49, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Fulham to take a throw-in in Crystal Palace territory.
Fulham have been awarded a corner by Graham Scott.
In the minute 51, Crystal Palace needs to be cautious. Fulham have an attacking throw-in.
Graham Scott blows against Fulham's Ola Aina for offside.
Throw-in Fulham.
In the minute 54, Fulham have a dangerous throw-in.
Crystal Palace have a goal kick.
Fulham awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 56, In London a free kick has been awarded the away team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in London.
Graham Scott signals a throw-in for Crystal Palace, close to Fulham's area.
In the minute 57, Graham Scott signals a Fulham throw-in in Crystal Palace's half.
Free kick for Fulham in the half of Crystal Palace.
Aleksandar Mitrovic's header is off-target for Fulham.
In the minute 58, Graham Scott awards Crystal Palace a goal kick.
Fulham drives forward and Tom Cairney gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 63, Can Fulham get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Crystal Palace's half?
In London Fulham attack through Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa. The finish is off target, however.
Crystal Palace have a goal kick.
In the minute 64, It's now 0-2 in London as Wilfried Zaha scores for Crystal Palace.
Michy Batshuayi instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 66, Ball goes out of play for a Crystal Palace goal kick.
The match at Craven Cottage has been interrupted briefly for a check on Wilfried Zaha, who is down injured.
The home team replace Andre-Frank Zambo Anguissa with Aboubakar Kamara.
Fulham's Ademola Lookman gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 67, Goal kick for Crystal Palace at Craven Cottage.
Ademola Lookman of Fulham gets in a strike, but is off target.
Graham Scott awards Crystal Palace a goal kick.
In the minute 69, Fulham needs to be cautious. Crystal Palace have an attacking throw-in.
Crystal Palace's Wilfried Zaha looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In London Crystal Palace drive forward through Tyrick Mitchell. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 71, Corner awarded to Crystal Palace.
Jairo Riedewald (Crystal Palace) strikes at Craven Cottage but his header is cleared.
Graham Scott signals a free kick to Crystal Palace in their own half.
In the minute 72, Crystal Palace make their first substitution with Patrick Van Aanholt replacing Nathaniel Clyne.
Crystal Palace to take a throw-in in Fulham territory.
In the minute 74, Graham Scott awards the home team a throw-in.
The home team have replaced Ruben Loftus-Cheek with Bobby Reid. This is the second substitution made today by Scott Parker.
Throw-in for Crystal Palace in the half of Fulham.
Throw-in Crystal Palace.
In the minute 75, Crystal Palace awarded a free kick in their own half.
Eberechi Eze is on a sub for Jeffrey Schlupp for Crystal Palace.
Throw-in for Fulham at Craven Cottage.
In the minute 77, Graham Scott signals a throw-in for Crystal Palace, close to Fulham's area.
Crystal Palace have a dangerous throw-in.
Crystal Palace's Michy Batshuayi gets in a shot on goal at Craven Cottage. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 79, Graham Scott signals a Fulham throw-in in Crystal Palace's half.
Scott Parker (Fulham) is making a third substitution, with Harrison Reed replacing Mario Lemina.
Crystal Palace have been awarded a corner by Graham Scott.
In the minute 81, Free kick Crystal Palace.
Jairo Riedewald is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Graham Scott signals a free kick to Fulham.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Crystal Palace in their own half.
Goal kick for Crystal Palace at Craven Cottage.
Mamadou Sakho (Crystal Palace) has replaced the possibly injured Jairo Riedewald.
In the minute 86, Free kick for Crystal Palace in their own half.
Aboubakar Kamara (Fulham) has been sent off!
Fulham awarded a free kick in their own half.
Crystal Palace's Patrick Van Aanholt is on target but unsuccessful.
6 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in London.
Fulham are coming forward and Tom Cairney gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in London.
In London Crystal Palace's Patrick Van Aanholt is caught offside.
Eberechi Eze for Crystal Palace gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Fulham have a goal kick.
Ola Aina for the home team is judged to be offside.
Fulham to take a throw-in in Crystal Palace territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Crystal Palace goal kick.
Graham Scott blows to end the match. The final score is 1-2.
Goal! Tom Cairney pulls one back for Fulham to make it 1-2.
Harrison Reed with an assist there.
Vicente Guaita (Crystal Palace) has received a yellow card from Graham Scott.
